Constructor Detail

GraphDSJavaClient

public GraphDSJavaClient(java.net.URI myUri,
                         java.lang.String myUserName,
                         java.lang.String myPassword)
Creates an instance of the client using a given uri and authentication params.

Parameters:
myUri - the URI of the GraphDB Service
myUserName - the username for authentication
myPassword - the password for authentication

GraphDSJavaClient

public GraphDSJavaClient(java.net.URI myUri,
                         java.lang.String myUserName,
                         java.lang.String myPassword,
                         int myDocumentType)
Creates an instance of the client using a given uri and authentication params. Makes it possible to chose between different accept document types (see GraphDSJavaClient.ACCEPT_TYPE_* constants)

Parameters:
myUri - the URI of the GraphDB Service
myUserName - the username for authentication
myPassword - the password for authentication
myDocumentType - the accept type
Method Detail

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Disconnects the client from the GraphDB Service

query

public QueryResult query(java.lang.String myQuery)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         org.jdom.JDOMException
Sends a querystring to the GraphDB Service

Parameters:
myQuery - the queryResult
Returns:
QueryResult the result of that query
Throws:
java.io.IOException - in case of connection or stream problems
org.jdom.JDOMException - in case of parsing problems
